quotes.quote: The crime of loving is forgetting.
quotes.author: Maurice Chevalier

quotes.quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Honor is not the exclusive property of any political party.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: I never called my work an 'art'. It's part of show business, the business of building entertainment.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Nature uses human imagination to lift her work of creation to even higher levels.
quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello
